Name: Lollo Campaign IV
Description: Maji looks strange today. Ask him what happened.
QuestDesc: Maji looks strange today. Ask him what happened.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm sorry, {PlayerName}. We'll have to suspend the pilot business for today. I have something urgent to attend to.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A courier at the Jinzhou Station, Guanxian, has gone missing. He was supposed to deliver the goods to the Port Gunchao Logistics Station an hour ago, but we haven't been able to reach him.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The navigation system shows that Guanxian is in Dim Forest. I was about to go and find him, that's why I changed into this outfit.

Options.PlotLineKey: Why did he go to Dim Forest?

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Most likely, trying to take a shortcut.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}, the situation is urgent. I heard that you can use the Resonance Beacon to reach Dim Forest faster. I must ask you for help.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: After dispersing the group of Hoochiefs, you and Maji bring the frightened freshman courier back to Jinzhou.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thanks for your help, {PlayerName}. Guanxian is fine, with just a few scratches.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: When he was taking the shortcut, a group of Hoochiefs found him and got greedy for the package in his box.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Even though he was chased by the Hoochiefs all around, he managed to hide the package while the Hoochiefs were distracted.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: When we rescued him, he somehow managed to find the items from somewhere.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As a Lollo Logistics courier, the first priority is to take responsibility for your own safety. Otherwise, how can you take responsibility for the packages you handle?

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What Lollo Logistics couriers least want to hear is the alarm for the activation of the "relay plan," which means...

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Maji remains silent for a while before calming down.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm sorry, {PlayerName}, I was being frivolous. Thank you very much for your help.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Here is today's reward. Thank you for lending a hand!
